urls.description: On 6 October 2021, BEREC held the public debriefing to present the results from its 48th ordinary meetings (29 September - 30 September 2021). The event took place at the IRG Secretariat, Rue de la Science 14, Brussels, at 14:00 CET and was also streamed live.
